Object Parameters: Time in 1/60 seconds used to lift and lower
Time in 1/60 seconds of stop after lift
Time in 1/60 seconds of stop after lowering
Description: Drawbridge from DS Delfino Square; the bridge in DS Delfino Square is created using two of these objects face to face. Regardless of Y-rotation, the object will always rotate on the Z-axis of the stage when the bridge is being lifted or lowered.
